column1: The number of coronavirus case is going down — and thank God for that!

Rachel, stop that! You’re better than that! The number of coronavirus cases has gone way down. Most states — including CA — are opening up. What you’re doing is misleading and frightening people unnecessarily. This is a nation wide pandemic. You should be helping not hurting
Well, at least we’re not worried about coronavirus anymore. That’s a relief!
Hey Rachel, what did you think of Pence’s talk about the coronavirus this after noon? He seems to have everything under control. It made me feel better. What did you think?
